overview:
Susan Hallam is Managing Director of Hallam Communications Ltd, an Internet Marketing agency based in Nottingham, UK.

Widely considered one of the UK’s leading Internet marketing gurus, Susan Hallam has been helping businesses to understand how the Internet can be used for competitive advantage for over a decade.

Susan’s expertise in Internet marketing is in great demand, and she has been quoted in places like The Sunday Times, presented at conferences like the SMX Search Marketing Expo, and presents workshops on behalf of economic development agencies in Europe.

Susan’s career covering the Internet began in 1993 when she presented her first Internet workshop at the Online Information Conference in London. Her workshops are known for making complex ideas easy to understand, and she has been invited to speak at conrferences in Hong Kong, New York & Washington, Amsterdam, and Paris.

Susan is currently managing director of Hallam Communications Ltd, an Internet marketing agency based in Nottingham, UK. She also serves on the board of EMITA: the East Midlands International Trade Association.
